author: perica_we
title: #144 "Nunca serÃ­a alcaldesa con los votos de EH Bildu. Prefiero fregar escaleras"
text:
[HackerRuso](/user/HackerRuso)a [twitter.com](/go/link/3891414) [#97](c97#c-97) Irene montero fuera de sus estudios trabajÃ³ de cajera en un supermercado, algo que el clasismo facheril criticÃ³ mucho en su momento, algo no muy diferente del clasismo de esta seÃ±ora del artÃ­culo.
Como si haber sido cajera en tu vida fuera una lacra o algo asÃ­, por otro lado ser comunity manager del perro de un polÃ­tico es MUY valorado por la misma gente.
[#103](c103#c-103) A ver, Irene Montero trabajÃ³ un aÃ±o de cajera. No tiene ninguna carrera profesional (aunque sea de cajera) ni profesiÃ³n a la que volver, como sÃ­ tienen Pablo Iglesias o Monedero, que volvieron a sus respectivos trabajos y profesiones.
Hasta Ayuso se supone que trabajÃ³ de periodista en distintos sitios, no solo haciendo de perro de la Aguirre. Digo se supone porque me fÃ­o poco de la Ayusa sin verificar su currÃ­culum, pero se supone que es asÃ­.
Y con esto yo no invalidaba que la seÃ±ora del pepÃ© que anda llorando porque le han dado la patada haya trabajado en algo real (que ni lo sÃ© ni me importa, no me extraÃ±arÃ­a que se hubiera tocado el higo toda su vida), sino contestaba al comentario de
[#46](c46#c-46) que habla de MÃ³nica GarcÃ­a, la cual tiene una carrera profesional como mÃ©dico anestesista en el 12 de Octubre.
[#105](c105#c-105) Entre 2011 y 2013 cursÃ³ y obtuvo el grado de mÃ¡ster en psicologÃ­a de la educaciÃ³n.11 Posteriormente, gracias a su rendimiento acadÃ©mico, obtuvo una ayuda para contratos predoctorales de FormaciÃ³n de Profesorado Universitario (FPU) en la UAM entre 2013 y 2015, consiguiendo a raÃ­z de esta una estancia formativa en la Universidad de Harvard, que rechazÃ³ por su compromiso polÃ­tico... https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Irene_Montero
Sobre muchos de los dirigentes de podemos y sobre el mismo Podemos se han lanzado tantos bulos y mentiras que en su vida se le quitara ya el San Benito de todos esos bulos. Pero no por ello hay que dejar de rebatirlo cuando se comenta.
[#125](c125#c-125) Efectivamente, fue a la uni. Y efectivamente, no trabajÃ³ jamÃ¡s (solo de cajera un aÃ±o). Ni tiene carrera profesional a la que volver, porque nunca ha trabajado de nada (mÃ¡s allÃ¡ de su breve periodo de cajera un aÃ±o).
AsÃ­ que sÃ­, gracias por complementar con el enlace de su entrada en la Wiki para corroborar que no trabajÃ³ en su vida. Y por eso no puede volver a nada como sÃ­ pudieron volver a lo suyo el propio Pablo, Monedero, Luis Alegre o Bescansa, que tenÃ­an todos su profesiÃ³n desde hacÃ­a muchos aÃ±os.
[#105](c105#c-105) Ayuso hace 20 aÃ±os que dejÃ³ de hacer de periodista, se supone que en una radio en Irlanda y otra en Colombia, cobrar del chiringuito Madrid Networks no es trabajar.
[#105](c105#c-105) Irene montero :
Doctora en Derecho Constitucional por la Universidad de Valladolid, master en Derecho Internacional por el Instituto de Estudios PolÃ­ticos para AmÃ©rica Latina y Ãfrica (Iepala) y licenciada en Derecho por la Universidad de Valladolid. Profesora Titular de Derecho Constitucional en la Universidad de Valladolid.
Ya quisieran muchos de nuestros politicastros tener una formaciÃ³n similar.
Montero se ha dedicado siempre a la polÃ­tica. Lo de no darle un palo al agua y ser la mujer de quiÃ©n es ya estÃ¡ bastante de mÃ¡s.
Puede que no te gusten sus ideas polÃ­ticas pero no veo yo masters falsos ni carreras sacadas en seis meses, ni mentiras varias, ni doctorados que no son, ni Harvard de tres dÃ­as.
Vamos, que su carrera profesional estÃ¡ orientada a la polÃ­tica. Si eso no es una carrera profesional..... No se ni para que existe la carrera de ciencias polÃ­ticas entonces.
[#137](c137#c-137) JAJAJAJAJA ESE NO ES EL CURRICULUM DE MONTERO!!!!!!!!!
ES EL DE LA MINISTRA DE IGUALDAD ACTUAL, Ana Redondo GarcÃ­a, DEL PSOE!!!
Irene Montero ni es doctora ni es nÃ¡!!!!!!!!!! JAJAJAJAJA
[#138](c138#c-138) mis disculpas. Trabajos predoctorales. Toma, de la razÃ³n:
La hoy ministra de Igualdad es licenciada en PsicologÃ­a por la Universidad AutÃ³noma de Madrid, una carrera en la que, segÃºn cita el currÃ­culum â€œestudiÃ³ con ayudas al estudio por aprovechamiento excelenteâ€ y por la que fue puntuada con una calificaciÃ³n de 9,09. AdemÃ¡s, Irene Montero ha realizado un MÃ¡ster en PsicologÃ­a de la EducaciÃ³n por la Universidad AutÃ³noma de Madrid, donde obtuvo 9 matrÃ­culas de honor y la calificaciÃ³n de 9,5 en la tesis de mÃ¡ster.
Google de inicio igual me ha traicionado.
Paso de discutir con JAJAJAS
[#139](c139#c-139) Vamos, que ni conocÃ­as su currÃ­culum ni te importaba
El JAJAJAJA es lÃ³gico ante ese sin sentido.
Y sÃ­, su currÃ­culum real es el que pones y que yo ya conocÃ­a (por eso me descojonÃ© al ver el que pusiste, que nada tenÃ­a que ver con el real... vaya tela): fue estudiante, solo eso. Y luego a tocarse los cojones en la polÃ­tica. No ha dado palo al agua en su vida, no ha trabajado en su vida. Es mÃ¡s inÃºtil que Ayuso, lo siento.
Y lo que dices de Ciencias PolÃ­ticas... eso es lo que estudiaron Pablo Iglesias, Monedero, Bescansa entre otros. Son politÃ³logos. Y ellos SÃ tienen un lugar al que volver, porque tenÃ­an y tienen una carrera profesional detrÃ¡s, que no implica ser chupabotes. Cosa que no tiene Montero. Irene Montero no tiene una profesiÃ³n a la que volver, asÃ­ que necesita que sus fangirls y sus seguidores le voten mucho para poder seguir viviendo del cuento toda su vida.
El 15M venÃ­a a acabar con liderazgos eternos y polÃ­ticos profesionales, vividores del cuento y de la mamandurria. Todo lo contrario de lo que representa ahora mismo Irene Montero, pasando a ser Podemos un viejo club polÃ­tico old school mÃ¡s.
[#103](c103#c-103) Me gusta ver a los 2 esos que van de izquierdas y quedan como cuÃ±aos clasistas a la mÃ­nima. El pony dijo el otro dÃ­a que Pablo Iglesias es un maltratador. Para que veas el nivel.
[#97](c97#c-97) No, el equivalente a Monica Garcia (medico anestesista). Esta de UPN (que no del PP como dije erroneamente) fue medico de urgencias:
"Fue mÃ©dica de urgencias del Hospital de Navarra y de algunos centros de atenciÃ³n primaria del Servicio Navarro de Salud, trabajando despuÃ©s en gestiÃ³n de salud."
https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristina_Ibarrola
[#110](c110#c-110) Ah coÃ±o
Al ser del PP daba por hecho que te referÃ­as a que no habÃ­a trabajado de nada en su vida (o lo daba por hecho yo).
[#10](c10#c-10) suelen ir de la mano. Lo que entiendo es que tienen tantos votos porque hay mucho millonario wannabe.
[#102](c102#c-102) Son como muchisimo "regionalistas". Hubo una escisiÃ³n de "nacionalistas navarros" que era el CDN pero no durÃ³ muchoas legislaturas teniendo escaÃ±os
Estos requetÃ©s, han tenido el ayuntamiento 4 aÃ±os sin tener mayorÃ­a y se pensaban que ahora iba a ser igual, mÃ¡s en minorÃ­a. Encima, se permiten el lujo de pelearse con el PP, para sumar menos aÃºn.
[#65](c65#c-65) plantÃ©atelo de la siguiente manera:
Ni loco serÃ­a presidente con el apoyo de bildu. Antes harÃ­a inserta tu trabajo aquÃ­.
[#108](c108#c-108) tu trabajo serÃ¡ cÃ³modo, pero lo que debes tener en cuenta en esa frase es el tono despectivo con el que se habla de tu trabajo.
[#17](c17#c-17) pocos de aquÃ­ se han dedicado a eso profesionalmente. No vayamos de lo que no somos. Si acaso nos ha tocado fregar el rellano nuestro y ya.
[#25](c25#c-25) Todo depende del contexto y de quiÃ©n lo dice. No es lo mismo que lo digamos tÃº o yo, que pueden venirnos mal dadas y efectivamente podemos acabar fregando escaleras o fregando platos en cualquier sitio para poder salir adelante, a que lo diga alguien bien acomodado desde las instituciones.
Es una frase clasista cuando la espera alguien desde el poder. Es clasista e indignante.
[#77](c77#c-77) Igual es que interesa pasar la frase por el filtro ideolÃ³gico, porque segÃºn la experiencia de miles de millones, al igual que otros trabajos duros, mal pagados y poco reconocidos, fregar escaleras no le gusta ni al "Tato".
Me temo que si en lugar de decir la frase "prefiero fregar escaleras" hubiera sido "prefiero escarbar cebollinos", seguro que muchos de los presentes sacarÃ­an punta a la frase, alegando una afrenta al colectivo de agricultores.

author: Tres Tristes Tigres
title: El Puerto anuncia una inversiÃ³n de 175.000 euros para mejorar siete centros educativos concertados
text:
El alcalde de El Puerto de Santa MarÃ­a (CÃ¡diz), GermÃ¡n Beardo, se ha reunido con los directores de los colegios concertados de la ciudad para informarles de que en 2025 recibirÃ¡n una subvenciÃ³n, que suma un total de 175.000 euros para que puedan llevar a cabo arreglos o mejoras en sus centros.

author: Thais Bueno Cirino
title: Morre ex-jogador francÃªs FranÃ§ois Bracci, lenda do Olympique de Marselha - Gazeta Esportiva
text: Morre ex-jogador francÃªs FranÃ§ois Bracci, lenda do Olympique de Marselha Por AFP 28/12/2023 Ã s 20:45 â€¢ Atualizado: 28/12/2023 Ã s 20:47 SÃ£o Paulo, SP FranÃ§ois Bracci, ex-lateral esquerdo da seleÃ§Ã£o da Bracci, terceiro jogador que mais vestiu a camisa do Olympique (349 jogos), fez 18 partidas pelos 'Bleus' e participou da Com o time de Marselha, foi campeÃ£o francÃªs em 1972 e conquistou a Copa da FranÃ§a em 1976. Bracci tambÃ©m foi jogador de Strasbourg, Bordeaux, Rouen e BÃ©ziers, antes de pendurar as chuteiras e iniciar a carreira como treinador. [FranÃ§a](https://www.gazetaesportiva.com/campeonatos/ligue-1)e lenda do Olympique de Marselha, faleceu nesta quinta-feira aos 72 anos, informou o clube em seu site. Bracci, terceiro jogador que mais vestiu a camisa do Olympique (349 jogos), fez 18 partidas pelos 'Bleus' e participou da [Copa do Mundo](https://www.gazetaesportiva.com/copa-do-mundo)de 1978, na Argentina. Com o time de Marselha, foi campeÃ£o francÃªs em 1972 e conquistou a Copa da FranÃ§a em 1976. Bracci tambÃ©m foi jogador de Strasbourg, Bordeaux, Rouen e BÃ©ziers, antes de pendurar as chuteiras e iniciar a carreira como treinador. FranÃ§ois Bracci sâ€™en est allÃ© ðŸ•Šï¸ 3Ã¨me joueur le plus capÃ© de lâ€™histoire olympienne, lâ€™ancien international franÃ§ais sâ€™est Ã©teint aujourdâ€™hui Ã  lâ€™Ã¢ge de 72 ans. Lâ€™Olympique de Marseille adresse ses sincÃ¨res condolÃ©ances Ã  sa famille et Ã  ses proches. [pic.twitter.com/RSBdorRgu2] â€” Olympique de Marseille (@OM_Officiel) [December 28, 2023]

author: Gyasi Gonzales
title: Trinis thank God 6.2 quake wasnâ€™t worse
text:
SATURDAY nightâ€™s 6.2 magnitude earthquake that shook most of Trinidad and was felt as far north as St Lucia and as far south as Guyana had many people thanking God on social media that it could have been much worse.
The earthquake was neither the longest nor the strongest but depending on where you live, the topography of the land and even the design of oneâ€™s house, it could result in one experience being different from the other.
There were electricity outages reported in west Trinidad but apart from hairline cracks to the outer wall plastering of some homes and buildings in central Trinidad, there was not much damage reported.
The Express reached out to the director of Seismic Research Centre at The University of the West Indies, St Augustine, Dr Erouscilla Joseph about the earthquake.
She reported the quake began at 11.58 p.m. and lasted between 30 to 33 seconds, had a depth of 46km and originated north of Carupano, Venezuela which, according to Joseph, is almost in line with Trinidadâ€™s north coast or 97 kilometres directly west of Port of Spain.
The last powerful earthquake felt in Trinidad was back on August 21 2018. That quake had a magnitude of 6.9 on the Richter Scale and lasted 90 seconds.
Dr Joseph said in Santa Cruz, where she lives, the quake was quite intense but still there was little to no damage reported where she was.
She reported however that in Chaguanas and Couva, there were some hairline cracks reported to the outer plastering of some newly-constructed homes. She explained that â€œnewer buildings where the foundation had not yet naturally settled,â€ there may be some cracks to the plastering outside but no major damage to these structures.
On social media many responded to the Expressâ€™ first story on the earthquake which appeared on the paperâ€™s social media site minutes after the late night shake-up.
â€œWilliamsville...was strong to wake me up from sleeping,â€ one man posted.
â€œPenal, very strong, the ceiling lights were swaying and I knew it was over a 6. The entire house was swaying a lot and last for a while,â€ one woman posted.
â€œI felt it, I was awake, letâ€™s not panic, Our Father Almighty is in control he will take us through, believe in him. In Jesus name amen,â€ another woman posted.
Respondents from all over Trinidad including Port of Spain, Diego Martin, Carenage and Glencoe complained of violent shaking.
People from Maracas Valley, St Joseph, El Dorado, Tunapuna, Arima and as far east as Sangre Grande also reported being awakened.
Central Trinidad was not spared with shaking reported in Chaguanas and Couva while south Trinidad also reported shaking in San Fernando, Marabella and Princes Town.
No damage to RHAs
The Regional Health Authorities all over Trinidad reported no damage to their facilities which indicated that no part of the island was spared.
According to the North West Regional Health Authority (NWRHA) there was no damage reported at the Port of Spain General Hospital, the St James Hospital, the St Annâ€™s Hospital as well as 26 other smaller facilities that fall under their purview.
â€œOur facilities have sustained no structural or operational damage in the aftermath of last eveningâ€™s earthquake, measuring magnitude of 6.2 struck at approximately 11.58 p.m.â€ the NWRHA stated in a release.
â€œAll emergency protocols were promptly activated to ensure the safety and well-being of patients and staff. Thanks to these measures and the dedication of our committed team, all hospital services continue to be available without interruption,â€ the Authority added.
The South West Regional Health Authority (SWRHA) reported similar findings with the San Fernando General Hospital having no reports of damage. Other health facilities in the south west area also reported no damage.
The North Central Regional Health Authority where the Eric Williams Medical Sciences Complex, Mt Hope is located also reported no signs of damage while other faculties also reported no damage.
The Eastern Regional Health Authority (ERHA) also reported no damage to their facilities as well, and like all the other authorities their services yesterday were not interrupted.
According to the ERHA â€œinitial damage assessments were conducted at our facilities and reports confirmed no damage to building and equipment at this time and the ERHA Disaster Co-ordinating team will continue to monitor the situation.â€
After Saturday nightâ€™s quake several areas in Trinidad including Glencoe, Cocorite, Carenage and Bamboo No. 2 reported power outages.
According to an unnamed official at the Trinidad and Tobago Electricity Commission power was restored within minutes in some areas while in other areas power took as much as an hour to be restored.

author: CXOtoday News Desk
title: Bosch Global Software Technologies Inaugurates Accessible Resource Center (ARC) to Advance Inclusive STEM Education for Students with Visual Impairment
text:
Bosch Global Software Technologies Inaugurates Accessible Resource Center (ARC) to Advance Inclusive STEM Education for Students with Visual Impairment
Bosch Global Software Technologies (BGSW), in collaboration with Vision Empower (VE) and the Centre for Accessibility in the Global South (CAGS) at the International Institute of Information Technology, Bangalore (IIITB), has inaugurated the Accessible Resource Center (ARC)â€”a pioneering inclusive education hub designed to students with visual impairment through assistive technology and special educators empowerment and training program through a specially curated pedagogy
As part of BGSWâ€™s CSR commitment to inclusive and sustainable development, ARC is focused on increasing access to quality STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) education for students with visual impairment in Grades Kâ€“10, while building the capacity of special educators to provide effective, technology-enabled instruction.
Located at IIITB, ARC follows the principles of universal design and is equipped with cutting-edge assistive technologies including tactile tools, refreshable Braille readers, interactive STEM kits, and an accessible Learning Management System. The center currently supports over 250 special educators from 28 schools across Karnataka, directly impacting more than 1,000 visually impaired students. It also emphasizes Early Childhood Care and Education (ECCE), to build foundational learning pathways for preschool-age children with visual impairments.
The ARC initiative addresses key challenges in special education by enhancing access to STEM content, providing specialized teacher training, and improving assistive infrastructure. It aims to drive sustainable, research-driven impact through a multi-pronged approach, which includes:
- Pragya: Technology-enabled STEM training for special educators
- Anubhav: Hands-on learning sessions for students using adaptive tools
- School Cluster Model: Collaborative school networks to tackle shared challenges
- A structured academic calendar supported by accessible teaching tools, digital content, and mentorship
A Celebrated Inauguration
The launch event featured a ribbon-cutting ceremony and engaging live demonstrations by students and educators, highlighting the transformative impact of assistive technologies in STEM education for the visually impaired. Key attendees included Prof. Debabrata Das, Director of IIIT Bangalore; Mr. Jacob Peter, Senior Vice President and Chairman of the CSR Steering Committee at BGSW; Prof. Amit Prakash, Co-convener of CAGS at IIIT, Bangalore and Ms. Shilpa Deodhar, CSR Head at BGSW; and representatives from Vision Empower, Microsoft Research, Azim Premji University, I-Stem foundation, and other accessibility-focused partners.
Highlights included the launch of the ARC microsite, the release of a comprehensive Landscape Mapping Research Report on the visual disability sector, and a panel discussion on â€œConverging to Design Collaborative Spaces for Inclusive Education,â€ featuring thought leaders from academia, technology, and the development sector. A specially designed tactile chessboard designed by Innovator Mr. Paul Dsouza, for visually impaired individuals was also unveiled, symbolizing ARCâ€™s commitment to innovation, inclusion, and empowerment.
A Shared Vision for an Inclusive Future
Speaking at the event, Ms. Shilpa Deodhar, CSR Head at BGSW, said, â€œThe ARC demonstrates the need for a mix combining inclusive design, customized pedagogy, assistive technology, personalized social engagement, and active community partnerships being instrumental in transforming education for students with visual impairment. We are proud to collaborate with Vision Empower and IIITB to build this holistic model, thereby paving a pathway for sustained impact.â€
This partnership reflects a long-term vision to build accessible education ecosystems that are collaborative, scalable, and rooted in empathy and innovation. BGSW, Vision Empower, and IIITB remain committed to creating equal learning opportunities for visually impaired students through inclusive design, accessible content, and educator empowerment.
Bosch Global Software
